Jeszcze lepiej od poprzedniej części. Lepszy humor, dłuższa ilość zabawy i fajnie zaprojektowane poziomy. Szczególnie te co są później. Wywalamy logikę za portal. A no i GlaDOS. No ona jest świetna. P.s kooperacja :)

Powiem tyle - świetna gierka. Momentami nie jest prosta, co uważam niewątpliwie za zaletę. Tryb kooperacji również przynosi dużo frajdy. Polecam każdemu zagrać. Tym bardziej, że (szczególnie na promocji) cena jest niska w stosunku do tego, co otrzymujemy.
Можно сделать порталы друг против друга,затем в один портал засунуть свой огурец,а к другому порталу приставить свою попку.Ощущения незабываемые!
Lots of fun. Challenging puzzles. Some easy ones. Makes you feel smart when you figure them out.
It's a very interesting concept that was brought out well. It is engaging whether that be through the story our just the funny characters.
i rate 7/7 on the 7 scale for rating games with a rating of 7

I picked this up during the Steam holiday sale having not played the first game.  I love puzzle type games and played previous games by this game studio, so this is right up my alley.  I'm four hours in and absolutely love it!  I did have to look up one room but otherwise it balances difficulty level increase throughout the game which many others scale too quickly.  The dialogue is funny and the overall story arc has been great so far.  Highly recommended for those that enjoy the challenge of good puzzle!
Лучшая игра с физикой для коорператива

I like the mechanic and the online mode is very fun with strangers and even more fun with friends
there are a few confusing parts in the single player (Mainly the gel levels) but otherwise 10/10 game would definitley recommend for others
sait bien mes le cope quand ta pas d'amie sait pas ouf

Es un juego clásico que si o si debes jugar con un compañero. De esos juegos cuya historia va más allá de lo que se narra en el juego y que con un amigo puede haber risas, traiciones y enojos. Aunque sea rompecabezas y puzzle vale la pena porque las mecánicas que tiene no han sido adaptadas en estos últimos años haciendo que el juego sea "fresco" a pesar de tener varios años.
这个游戏早年前就玩过盗版的，后来折后把1，2部都入手了，虽然只玩了几个小时就通关了，但是确实是一部很经典的大作，推荐！
Somehow, Valve took a masterpiece, and made an even better masterpiece. With multiplayer. With better characters. With expanded mechanics. With a longer story. But no cake :(

This is a perfect way to introduce your girlfriend to first-person shooters or to gaming in general, and to test how compatible you are early on in the relationship.

The challenges in the co-op mode can be exciting and fun (good scenario) or downright infuriating (obviously the bad one) depending on the person with whom you share the experience. When we got started, my girlfriend did not know how to use the mouse in FPS games properly – all the time she was staring either at the floor or at the ceiling, missing all visual clues, and I had to help her perform even the simplest of things like creating different portals or jumping through them. Now she is an avid backseat gamer, so I got to share one of my hobbies with my partner thanks to this wonderful piece of art, and this is why I consider it to be extremely valuable. It can unite people, help them understand each other better, and create a stronger bond.
its a great game I really loved it and I think you'll love it too
По началу очень нудно и очень сложно,но потом привыкаешь и это aх*енно! КОНЦОВКА ВООБЩЕ ЗАШИБИСЬ
Çok güzel ve akıcı bir oyun. Bölümleri geçtikçe kapıları açmak zorlaşıyor
Кооп. режим сначала имеет сложность для детей 1-го класса, потом, после полного прохождения первых 5-ти частей, игра становится интереснее.

I would absolutely recommend this game! 

Portal 2 is a fantastic game with excellent game mechanics. The single-player campaign provides an intuitive learning system, which is entertaining throughout its entirety, however, the story moments are a little intrusive as they prevent progression until completed. The Co-op provides a fun co-operative puzzle based progression experience as you go through several branches, this gamemode is even more fun with a friend that actually wants to complete the puzzles instead of killing you, but overall is a fun experience.

Portal 2 is an improved version of the first game, with new mechanics such as the gel, and general polish over the portal mechanics themselves (the portals now have a little less freedom over where you can place them, but this generally helps you complete the puzzles without being too intrusive.

Overall, I would rate Portal two a 9/10. Entirely recommended!

Если честно я обожаю серию игр Portal, в этой части прекрасный сюжет, атмосфера, музыкальное и звуковое сопровождение. Крутой дубляж, круче всех озвучен Уитли. COOP работает хорошо, без помех + легко подключиться. Прошёл на пиратке кучу раз и не жалею, что сейчас её купил!
